front.title: Role-based Authorization Requirements for the Session Initiation Protocol

abstract.t: This document lays out a set of requirements related to role-basedauthorization for the Session Initiation Protocol. While numerousauthentication mechanisms are described in the base SIPspecification, role-based authorization provides information used tomake policy decisions based on the attributes of a participant in asession. This approach provides a richer framework forauthorization, as well as allow greater privacy for users of anidentity system.
